input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.span: All Green Local School District facilities are closed for the remainder of the school year.
To access the latest information and resources from the district, see our

During the period of the Governor's Executive Order 2020-10D, and in conjunction with House Bill 197, the Green Local School District's Board of Education meetings will be held virtually. Each meeting can be viewed live following this link :

br.span: It will be archived for later viewing on YouTube as well.

Public Participation during this period will move forward via email. If you have a comment or question to be read aloud at the Board of Education meeting please send these via email to any Board of Education member, Superintendent, or Treasurer.

span.br:
1755 Town Park Boulevard, Green, OH
Phone: 330-896-7500 | Fax: 330-896-7529

li.a: Be Safe, Be Kind, Be Responsible!

a.em: For previous letters, please view archives at this link.

a.span: Be Safe. Be Kind. Be Responsible.

span.span: Our school district continues to receive regular updates from both Summit and Stark County Departments of Health, the Ohio Department of Health (ODH), and the Centers for Disease Control (CDC). We are also actively communicating with other school districts, health care organizations, state and regional officials, City of Green administration and first responders to receive additional updates and proactively review local plans and actions.

p.span: In the meantime, our best defense against the spread of respiratory viruses, including the coronavirus and influenza, is prevention and planning. By following the
, together we can reduce illness in our schools and our community.

div.span:
Green Local Schools: 1755 Town Park Boulevard, Green, OH | Phone: 330-896-7500 | Fax: 330-896-7529
